Section.name: About ABIET
Section.description:
Aman Bhalla Institute of Engineering and Technology (ABIET) is a self-financed and privately managed institute run by Aman Bhalla Foundation. It was established in 2008 with the aim to provide high quality technical education to the students.
Extracurricular: College has following clubs, student bodies that organize various extracurricular activities throughout the year-
Facilities: Some of the facilities that are provided by the college are mentioned below-
Fee Waiver Scheme: College reserves some seats for economically weak students, women and handicapped peoples for fee waiver scheme. Following is the department wise details of such seats-
